00013 inline void EventQueue::SwapEvents(int c1, int c2){
00014         Event * exchange;
00015         exchange=Events[c2];
00016         Events[c2]=Events[c1];
00017         Events[c1]=exchange;
00018 }

00020 void EventQueue::InsertEvent(Event * event){
00021         Events.push_back(event);
00022       
00023         for(long int c=long(Size());c>1 && Events[c/2]->GetTime() > Events[c]->GetTime(); c/=2){
00024         SwapEvents(c, c/2);
00025         }
00026     
00027     return;
00028 }
00029 
00030 long long EventQueue::Size() const{
00031         return (Events.size()-1);
00032 }
00033                 
00034 Event * EventQueue::RemoveEvent(void){
00035         unsigned int c,p;
00036         
00037         Event * first;
00038         if(Size()>0){
00039                 first=Events[1];
00040       
00041         Events[1]=Events.back();
00042         Events.pop_back();
00043       
00044         p=1;
00045         for(c=p*2;c<Size();p=c,c=p*2){
00046                 if(Events[c]->GetTime() > Events[c+1]->GetTime())
00047                         c++;
00048                 
00049                 if(Events[c]->GetTime() < Events[p]->GetTime())
00050                 SwapEvents(p, c);
00051                 else
00052                 break;
00053         }
00054       
00055         if(c==Size() && Events[p]->GetTime() > Events[c]->GetTime())
00056                 SwapEvents(p, c);
00057         } else {
00058                 first->SetTime(-1);
00059     }
00060     
00061     return(first);
00062 }

00064 double EventQueue::FirstEventTime() const{
00065         float ti;
00066         
00067         if(Size()>0)
00068                 ti=Events[1]->GetTime();
00069         else
00070         ti=-1.0;
00071    
00072         return(ti);             
00073 }
